# THIS IS A GENERATED FILE.
#
# Source template:
# added_folders/templates/common/scripted_effects/godherja/GH_magic_aspect_effects.txt.jinja
#
# Please avoid manually editing this file: your changes WILL be overwritten when it gets regenerated.
# Instead, edit the source template and/or variables, then run render_templates.bat .

magic_aspect_effect = {
	$MODE$_aspect_effect = { ASPECT = fire }
	$MODE$_aspect_effect = { ASPECT = water }
	$MODE$_aspect_effect = { ASPECT = ice }
	$MODE$_aspect_effect = { ASPECT = air }
	$MODE$_aspect_effect = { ASPECT = stone }
	$MODE$_aspect_effect = { ASPECT = dream }
	$MODE$_aspect_effect = { ASPECT = celestial }
	$MODE$_aspect_effect = { ASPECT = dark }
	$MODE$_aspect_effect = { ASPECT = light }
	$MODE$_aspect_effect = { ASPECT = blood }
	$MODE$_aspect_effect = { ASPECT = nature }
	$MODE$_aspect_effect = { ASPECT = ethereal }
	$MODE$_aspect_effect = { ASPECT = hymns }
	$MODE$_aspect_effect = { ASPECT = death }
	$MODE$_aspect_effect = { ASPECT = sand }
	$MODE$_aspect_effect = { ASPECT = metal }
	$MODE$_aspect_effect = { ASPECT = time }
	$MODE$_aspect_effect = { ASPECT = dawn }
}

initialize_global_aspect_list_effect = {
	add_to_global_variable_list = {
		name = global_aspect_list
		target = flag:fire
	}
	add_to_global_variable_list = {
		name = global_aspect_list
		target = flag:water
	}
	add_to_global_variable_list = {
		name = global_aspect_list
		target = flag:ice
	}
	add_to_global_variable_list = {
		name = global_aspect_list
		target = flag:air
	}
	add_to_global_variable_list = {
		name = global_aspect_list
		target = flag:stone
	}
	add_to_global_variable_list = {
		name = global_aspect_list
		target = flag:dream
	}
	add_to_global_variable_list = {
		name = global_aspect_list
		target = flag:celestial
	}
	add_to_global_variable_list = {
		name = global_aspect_list
		target = flag:dark
	}
	add_to_global_variable_list = {
		name = global_aspect_list
		target = flag:light
	}
	add_to_global_variable_list = {
		name = global_aspect_list
		target = flag:blood
	}
	add_to_global_variable_list = {
		name = global_aspect_list
		target = flag:nature
	}
	add_to_global_variable_list = {
		name = global_aspect_list
		target = flag:ethereal
	}
	add_to_global_variable_list = {
		name = global_aspect_list
		target = flag:hymns
	}
	add_to_global_variable_list = {
		name = global_aspect_list
		target = flag:death
	}
	add_to_global_variable_list = {
		name = global_aspect_list
		target = flag:sand
	}
	add_to_global_variable_list = {
		name = global_aspect_list
		target = flag:metal
	}
	add_to_global_variable_list = {
		name = global_aspect_list
		target = flag:time
	}
	add_to_global_variable_list = {
		name = global_aspect_list
		target = flag:dawn
	}
}

increase_from_scheme_aspect_effect = {
	if = {
		limit = { exists = scope:scheme.var:$ASPECT$ }
		add_aspect_skill_effect = { ASPECT = $ASPECT$ VALUE = scope:scheme.var:$ASPECT$ }
	}
}

pick_random_valid_aspect_to_increase_from_scheme_effect = {
	random_list = {
		1 = {
			trigger = {
				OR = {
					var:primary_aspect = flag:fire
					var:secondary_aspect = flag:fire
				}
			}
			modifier = {
				add = 2
				var:primary_aspect = flag:fire
			}
			save_scope_value_as = {
				name = aspect_being_increased
				value = flag:fire
			}
		}
		1 = {
			trigger = {
				OR = {
					var:primary_aspect = flag:water
					var:secondary_aspect = flag:water
				}
			}
			modifier = {
				add = 2
				var:primary_aspect = flag:water
			}
			save_scope_value_as = {
				name = aspect_being_increased
				value = flag:water
			}
		}
		1 = {
			trigger = {
				OR = {
					var:primary_aspect = flag:ice
					var:secondary_aspect = flag:ice
				}
			}
			modifier = {
				add = 2
				var:primary_aspect = flag:ice
			}
			save_scope_value_as = {
				name = aspect_being_increased
				value = flag:ice
			}
		}
		1 = {
			trigger = {
				OR = {
					var:primary_aspect = flag:air
					var:secondary_aspect = flag:air
				}
			}
			modifier = {
				add = 2
				var:primary_aspect = flag:air
			}
			save_scope_value_as = {
				name = aspect_being_increased
				value = flag:air
			}
		}
		1 = {
			trigger = {
				OR = {
					var:primary_aspect = flag:stone
					var:secondary_aspect = flag:stone
				}
			}
			modifier = {
				add = 2
				var:primary_aspect = flag:stone
			}
			save_scope_value_as = {
				name = aspect_being_increased
				value = flag:stone
			}
		}
		1 = {
			trigger = {
				OR = {
					var:primary_aspect = flag:dream
					var:secondary_aspect = flag:dream
				}
			}
			modifier = {
				add = 2
				var:primary_aspect = flag:dream
			}
			save_scope_value_as = {
				name = aspect_being_increased
				value = flag:dream
			}
		}
		1 = {
			trigger = {
				OR = {
					var:primary_aspect = flag:celestial
					var:secondary_aspect = flag:celestial
				}
			}
			modifier = {
				add = 2
				var:primary_aspect = flag:celestial
			}
			save_scope_value_as = {
				name = aspect_being_increased
				value = flag:celestial
			}
		}
		1 = {
			trigger = {
				OR = {
					var:primary_aspect = flag:dark
					var:secondary_aspect = flag:dark
				}
			}

				add = 2
				var:primary_aspect = flag:dark
			}
			save_scope_value_as = {
				name = aspect_being_increased
				value = flag:dark
			}
		}
		1 = {
			trigger = {
				OR = {
					var:primary_aspect = flag:light
					var:secondary_aspect = flag:light
				}

				add = 2
				var:primary_aspect = flag:light

			save_scope_value_as = {
				name = aspect_being_increased
				value = flag:light

			save_scope_value_as = {
				name = aspect_being_increased
				value = flag:sand
			}

				OR = {
					var:primary_aspect = flag:metal
					var:secondary_aspect = flag:metal
				}

			modifier = {
				add = 2
				var:primary_aspect = flag:metal

			save_scope_value_as = {
				name = aspect_being_increased

			}

					var:primary_aspect = flag:dawn
					var:secondary_aspect = flag:dawn
				}
			}
			modifier = {
				add = 2
				var:primary_aspect = flag:dawn
			}
			save_scope_value_as = {
				name = aspect_being_increased
				value = flag:dawn
			}
		}
	}
}

add_scoped_aspect_skill_effect = {
	if = {
		limit = { $SCOPE$ = flag:fire }
		add_aspect_skill_effect = { ASPECT = fire VALUE = $VALUE$ }
	}
	if = {
		limit = { $SCOPE$ = flag:water }
		add_aspect_skill_effect = { ASPECT = water VALUE = $VALUE$ }
	}
	if = {
		limit = { $SCOPE$ = flag:ice }
		add_aspect_skill_effect = { ASPECT = ice VALUE = $VALUE$ }
	}
	if = {
		limit = { $SCOPE$ = flag:air }
		add_aspect_skill_effect = { ASPECT = air VALUE = $VALUE$ }
	}
	if = {
		limit = { $SCOPE$ = flag:stone }
		add_aspect_skill_effect = { ASPECT = stone VALUE = $VALUE$ }
	}
	if = {
		limit = { $SCOPE$ = flag:dream }
		add_aspect_skill_effect = { ASPECT = dream VALUE = $VALUE$ }
	}
	if = {
		limit = { $SCOPE$ = flag:celestial }
		add_aspect_skill_effect = { ASPECT = celestial VALUE = $VALUE$ }
	}
	if = {
		limit = { $SCOPE$ = flag:dark }
		add_aspect_skill_effect = { ASPECT = dark VALUE = $VALUE$ }
	}
	if = {
		limit = { $SCOPE$ = flag:light }
		add_aspect_skill_effect = { ASPECT = light VALUE = $VALUE$ }
	}
	if = {
		limit = { $SCOPE$ = flag:blood }
		add_aspect_skill_effect = { ASPECT = blood VALUE = $VALUE$ }
	}
	if = {
		limit = { $SCOPE$ = flag:nature }
		add_aspect_skill_effect = { ASPECT = nature VALUE = $VALUE$ }
	}
	if = {
		limit = { $SCOPE$ = flag:ethereal }
		add_aspect_skill_effect = { ASPECT = ethereal VALUE = $VALUE$ }
	}
	if = {
		limit = { $SCOPE$ = flag:hymns }
		add_aspect_skill_effect = { ASPECT = hymns VALUE = $VALUE$ }
	}
	if = {
		limit = { $SCOPE$ = flag:death }
		add_aspect_skill_effect = { ASPECT = death VALUE = $VALUE$ }
	}
	if = {
		limit = { $SCOPE$ = flag:sand }
		add_aspect_skill_effect = { ASPECT = sand VALUE = $VALUE$ }
	}
	if = {
		limit = { $SCOPE$ = flag:metal }
		add_aspect_skill_effect = { ASPECT = metal VALUE = $VALUE$ }
	}
	if = {
		limit = { $SCOPE$ = flag:time }
		add_aspect_skill_effect = { ASPECT = time VALUE = $VALUE$ }
	}
	if = {
		limit = { $SCOPE$ = flag:dawn }
		add_aspect_skill_effect = { ASPECT = dawn VALUE = $VALUE$ }
	}
}

add_aspect_skill_effect = {
	if = {
		limit = { NOT = { $VALUE$ = 0 } }
		custom_description = {
			text = gain_$ASPECT$_skill
			value = $VALUE$
			if = {
				limit = { 
					NOT = { exists = var:$ASPECT$ }
				}
				set_variable = {
					name = $ASPECT$
					value = $VALUE$
				}
			}
			else = {
				change_variable = {
					name = $ASPECT$
					add = $VALUE$
				}
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					exists = var:$ASPECT$
					var:$ASPECT$ <= 0
				}
				remove_variable = $ASPECT$
			}
		}
	}
}

learn_character_creation_aspects_effect = {
	if = {
		limit = { 
			exists = title:c_oraispol.var:arcana
		}
		set_variable = { name = arcana value = title:c_oraispol.var:arcana }
		title:c_oraispol = { remove_variable = arcana }
	}
	if = {
		limit = { 
			exists = title:c_oraispol.var:fire
		}
		set_variable = { name = fire value = title:c_oraispol.var:fire }
		title:c_oraispol = { remove_variable = fire }
	}
	if = {
		limit = { 
			exists = title:c_oraispol.var:water
		}
		set_variable = { name = water value = title:c_oraispol.var:water }
		title:c_oraispol = { remove_variable = water }
	}
	if = {
		limit = { 
			exists = title:c_oraispol.var:ice
		}
		set_variable = { name = ice value = title:c_oraispol.var:ice }
		title:c_oraispol = { remove_variable = ice }
	}
	if = {
		limit = { 
			exists = title:c_oraispol.var:air
		}
		set_variable = { name = air value = title:c_oraispol.var:air }
		title:c_oraispol = { remove_variable = air }
	}
	if = {
		limit = { 
			exists = title:c_oraispol.var:stone
		}
		set_variable = { name = stone value = title:c_oraispol.var:stone }
		title:c_oraispol = { remove_variable = stone }
	}
	if = {
		limit = { 
			exists = title:c_oraispol.var:dream
		}
		set_variable = { name = dream value = title:c_oraispol.var:dream }
		title:c_oraispol = { remove_variable = dream }
	}
	if = {
		limit = { 
			exists = title:c_oraispol.var:celestial
		}
		set_variable = { name = celestial value = title:c_oraispol.var:celestial }
		title:c_oraispol = { remove_variable = celestial }
	}
	if = {
		limit = { 
			exists = title:c_oraispol.var:dark
		}
		set_variable = { name = dark value = title:c_oraispol.var:dark }
		title:c_oraispol = { remove_variable = dark }
	}
	if = {
		limit = { 
			exists = title:c_oraispol.var:light
		}
		set_variable = { name = light value = title:c_oraispol.var:light }
		title:c_oraispol = { remove_variable = light }
	}
	if = {
		limit = { 
			exists = title:c_oraispol.var:blood
		}
		set_variable = { name = blood value = title:c_oraispol.var:blood }
		title:c_oraispol = { remove_variable = blood }
	}
	if = {
		limit = { 
			exists = title:c_oraispol.var:nature
		}
		set_variable = { name = nature value = title:c_oraispol.var:nature }
		title:c_oraispol = { remove_variable = nature }
	}
	if = {
		limit = { 
			exists = title:c_oraispol.var:ethereal
		}
		set_variable = { name = ethereal value = title:c_oraispol.var:ethereal }
		title:c_oraispol = { remove_variable = ethereal }
	}
	if = {
		limit = { 
			exists = title:c_oraispol.var:hymns
		}
		set_variable = { name = hymns value = title:c_oraispol.var:hymns }
		title:c_oraispol = { remove_variable = hymns }
	}
	if = {
		limit = { 
			exists = title:c_oraispol.var:death
		}
		set_variable = { name = death value = title:c_oraispol.var:death }
		title:c_oraispol = { remove_variable = death }
	}
	if = {
		limit = { 
			exists = title:c_oraispol.var:sand
		}
		set_variable = { name = sand value = title:c_oraispol.var:sand }
		title:c_oraispol = { remove_variable = sand }
	}
	if = {
		limit = { 
			exists = title:c_oraispol.var:metal
		}
		set_variable = { name = metal value = title:c_oraispol.var:metal }
		title:c_oraispol = { remove_variable = metal }
	}
	if = {
		limit = { 
			exists = title:c_oraispol.var:time
		}
		set_variable = { name = time value = title:c_oraispol.var:time }
		title:c_oraispol = { remove_variable = time }
	}
	if = {
		limit = { 
			exists = title:c_oraispol.var:dawn
		}
		set_variable = { name = dawn value = title:c_oraispol.var:dawn }
		title:c_oraispol = { remove_variable = dawn }
	}
}

# Scope: Character - character whose current highest-skilled aspect to store as a flag in a variable on them
# VARIABLE         - variable name to store the flag under
save_strongest_aspect_flag_effect = {
	set_variable = {
		name = $VARIABLE$
		value = flag:fire
	}

	if = {
		limit = {
			aspect_spellcasting_value_greater_than_flag_trigger = {
				ASPECT_LHS = water
				ASPECT_RHS_FLAG = var:$VARIABLE$
			}
		}

		set_variable = {
			name = $VARIABLE$
			value = flag:water
		}
	}

	if = {
		limit = {
			aspect_spellcasting_value_greater_than_flag_trigger = {
				ASPECT_LHS = ice
				ASPECT_RHS_FLAG = var:$VARIABLE$
			}
		}

		set_variable = {
			name = $VARIABLE$
			value = flag:ice
		}
	}

	if = {
		limit = {
			aspect_spellcasting_value_greater_than_flag_trigger = {
				ASPECT_LHS = air
				ASPECT_RHS_FLAG = var:$VARIABLE$
			}
		}

		set_variable = {
			name = $VARIABLE$
			value = flag:air
		}
	}

	if = {
		limit = {
			aspect_spellcasting_value_greater_than_flag_trigger = {
				ASPECT_LHS = stone
				ASPECT_RHS_FLAG = var:$VARIABLE$
			}
		}

		set_variable = {
			name = $VARIABLE$
			value = flag:stone
		}
	}

	if = {
		limit = {
			aspect_spellcasting_value_greater_than_flag_trigger = {
				ASPECT_LHS = dream
				ASPECT_RHS_FLAG = var:$VARIABLE$
			}
		}

		set_variable = {
			name = $VARIABLE$
			value = flag:dream
		}
	}

	if = {
		limit = {
			aspect_spellcasting_value_greater_than_flag_trigger = {
				ASPECT_LHS = celestial
				ASPECT_RHS_FLAG = var:$VARIABLE$
			}
		}

		set_variable = {
			name = $VARIABLE$
			value = flag:celestial
		}
	}

	if = {
		limit = {
			aspect_spellcasting_value_greater_than_flag_trigger = {
				ASPECT_LHS = dark
				ASPECT_RHS_FLAG = var:$VARIABLE$
			}
		}

		set_variable = {
			name = $VARIABLE$
			value = flag:dark
		}
	}

	if = {
		limit = {
			aspect_spellcasting_value_greater_than_flag_trigger = {
				ASPECT_LHS = light
				ASPECT_RHS_FLAG = var:$VARIABLE$
			}
		}

		set_variable = {
			name = $VARIABLE$
			value = flag:light
		}
	}

	if = {
		limit = {
			aspect_spellcasting_value_greater_than_flag_trigger = {
				ASPECT_LHS = blood
				ASPECT_RHS_FLAG = var:$VARIABLE$
			}
		}

		set_variable = {
			name = $VARIABLE$
			value = flag:blood
		}
	}

	if = {
		limit = {
			aspect_spellcasting_value_greater_than_flag_trigger = {
				ASPECT_LHS = nature
				ASPECT_RHS_FLAG = var:$VARIABLE$
			}
		}

		set_variable = {
			name = $VARIABLE$
			value = flag:nature
		}
	}

	if = {
		limit = {
			aspect_spellcasting_value_greater_than_flag_trigger = {
				ASPECT_LHS = ethereal
				ASPECT_RHS_FLAG = var:$VARIABLE$
			}
		}

		set_variable = {
			name = $VARIABLE$
			value = flag:ethereal
		}
	}

	if = {
		limit = {
			aspect_spellcasting_value_greater_than_flag_trigger = {
				ASPECT_LHS = hymns
				ASPECT_RHS_FLAG = var:$VARIABLE$
			}
		}

		set_variable = {
			name = $VARIABLE$
			value = flag:hymns
		}
	}

	if = {
		limit = {
			aspect_spellcasting_value_greater_than_flag_trigger = {
				ASPECT_LHS = death
				ASPECT_RHS_FLAG = var:$VARIABLE$
			}
		}

		set_variable = {
			name = $VARIABLE$
			value = flag:death
		}
	}

	if = {
		limit = {
			aspect_spellcasting_value_greater_than_flag_trigger = {
				ASPECT_LHS = sand
				ASPECT_RHS_FLAG = var:$VARIABLE$
			}
		}

		set_variable = {
			name = $VARIABLE$
			value = flag:sand
		}
	}

	if = {
		limit = {
			aspect_spellcasting_value_greater_than_flag_trigger = {
				ASPECT_LHS = metal
				ASPECT_RHS_FLAG = var:$VARIABLE$
			}
		}

		set_variable = {
			name = $VARIABLE$
			value = flag:metal
		}
	}

	if = {
		limit = {
			aspect_spellcasting_value_greater_than_flag_trigger = {
				ASPECT_LHS = time
				ASPECT_RHS_FLAG = var:$VARIABLE$
			}
		}

		set_variable = {
			name = $VARIABLE$
			value = flag:time
		}
	}

	if = {
		limit = {
			aspect_spellcasting_value_greater_than_flag_trigger = {
				ASPECT_LHS = dawn
				ASPECT_RHS_FLAG = var:$VARIABLE$
			}
		}

		set_variable = {
			name = $VARIABLE$
			value = flag:dawn
		}
	}
}

initialize_province_specializations_game_start_effect = {
	every_province = {
		limit = {
			province_max_aspect_specializations_value > 0
			OR = {
				NOT = { has_variable_list = province_aspect_specialization_list }
				variable_list_size = {
					name = province_aspect_specialization_list
					value < province_max_aspect_specializations_value
				}
			}
		}
		ai_select_province_aspect_specialization_effect = yes
	}
}

ai_select_province_aspect_specialization_effect = {
	if = {
		limit = {
			OR = {
				NOT = { has_variable_list = province_aspect_specialization_list }
				variable_list_size = {
					name = province_aspect_specialization_list
					value < province_max_aspect_specializations_value
				}
			}
		}
		random_list = {
			0 = {
				trigger = {
					NOT = {
						is_target_in_variable_list = {
							name = province_aspect_specialization_list
							target = flag:fire
						}
					} 
					fire_aspect_province_value > 0
				}
				modifier = {
					add = fire_aspect_province_value
				}
				add_to_variable_list = {
					name = province_aspect_specialization_list
					target = flag:fire
				}
			}
			0 = {
				trigger = {
					NOT = {
						is_target_in_variable_list = {
							name = province_aspect_specialization_list
							target = flag:water
						}
					} 
					water_aspect_province_value > 0
				}
				modifier = {
					add = water_aspect_province_value
				}
				add_to_variable_list = {
					name = province_aspect_specialization_list
					target = flag:water
				}
			}
			0 = {
				trigger = {
					NOT = {
						is_target_in_variable_list = {
							name = province_aspect_specialization_list
							target = flag:ice
						}
					} 
					ice_aspect_province_value > 0
				}
				modifier = {
					add = ice_aspect_province_value
				}
				add_to_variable_list = {
					name = province_aspect_specialization_list
					target = flag:ice
				}
			}
			0 = {
				trigger = {
					NOT = {
						is_target_in_variable_list = {
							name = province_aspect_specialization_list
							target = flag:air
						}
					} 
					air_aspect_province_value > 0
				}
				modifier = {
					add = air_aspect_province_value
				}
				add_to_variable_list = {
					name = province_aspect_specialization_list
					target = flag:air
				}
			}
			0 = {
				trigger = {
					NOT = {
						is_target_in_variable_list = {
							name = province_aspect_specialization_list
							target = flag:stone
						}
					} 
					stone_aspect_province_value > 0
				}
				modifier = {
					add = stone_aspect_province_value
				}
				add_to_variable_list = {
					name = province_aspect_specialization_list
					target = flag:stone
				}
			}
			0 = {
				trigger = {
					NOT = {
						is_target_in_variable_list = {
							name = province_aspect_specialization_list
							target = flag:dream
						}
					} 
					dream_aspect_province_value > 0
				}
				modifier = {
					add = dream_aspect_province_value
				}
				add_to_variable_list = {
					name = province_aspect_specialization_list
					target = flag:dream
				}
			}
			0 = {
				trigger = {
					NOT = {
						is_target_in_variable_list = {
							name = province_aspect_specialization_list
							target = flag:celestial
						}
					} 
					celestial_aspect_province_value > 0
				}
				modifier = {
					add = celestial_aspect_province_value
				}
				add_to_variable_list = {
					name = province_aspect_specialization_list
					target = flag:celestial
				}
			}
			0 = {
				trigger = {
					NOT = {
						is_target_in_variable_list = {
							name = province_aspect_specialization_list
							target = flag:dark
						}
					} 
					dark_aspect_province_value > 0
				}
				modifier = {
					add = dark_aspect_province_value
				}
				add_to_variable_list = {
					name = province_aspect_specialization_list
					target = flag:dark
				}
			}
			0 = {
				trigger = {
					NOT = {
						is_target_in_variable_list = {
							name = province_aspect_specialization_list
							target = flag:light
						}
					} 
					light_aspect_province_value > 0
				}
				modifier = {
					add = light_aspect_province_value
				}
				add_to_variable_list = {
					name = province_aspect_specialization_list
					target = flag:light
				}
			}
			0 = {
				trigger = {
					NOT = {
						is_target_in_variable_list = {
							name = province_aspect_specialization_list
							target = flag:blood
						}
					} 
					blood_aspect_province_value > 0
				}
				modifier = {
					add = blood_aspect_province_value
				}
				add_to_variable_list = {
					name = province_aspect_specialization_list
					target = flag:blood
				}
			}
			0 = {
				trigger = {
					NOT = {
						is_target_in_variable_list = {
							name = province_aspect_specialization_list
							target = flag:nature
						}
					} 
					nature_aspect_province_value > 0
				}
				modifier = {
					add = nature_aspect_province_value
				}
				add_to_variable_list = {
					name = province_aspect_specialization_list
					target = flag:nature
				}
			}
			0 = {
				trigger = {
					NOT = {
						is_target_in_variable_list = {
							name = province_aspect_specialization_list
							target = flag:ethereal
						}
					} 
					ethereal_aspect_province_value > 0
				}
				modifier = {
					add = ethereal_aspect_province_value
				}
				add_to_variable_list = {
					name = province_aspect_specialization_list
					target = flag:ethereal
				}
			}
			0 = {
				trigger = {
					NOT = {
						is_target_in_variable_list = {
							name = province_aspect_specialization_list
							target = flag:hymns
						}
					} 
					hymns_aspect_province_value > 0
				}
				modifier = {
					add = hymns_aspect_province_value
				}
				add_to_variable_list = {
					name = province_aspect_specialization_list
					target = flag:hymns
				}
			}
			0 = {
				trigger = {
					NOT = {
						is_target_in_variable_list = {
							name = province_aspect_specialization_list
							target = flag:death
						}
					} 
					death_aspect_province_value > 0
				}
				modifier = {
					add = death_aspect_province_value
				}
				add_to_variable_list = {
					name = province_aspect_specialization_list
					target = flag:death
				}
			}
			0 = {
				trigger = {
					NOT = {
						is_target_in_variable_list = {
							name = province_aspect_specialization_list
							target = flag:sand
						}
					} 
					sand_aspect_province_value > 0
				}
				modifier = {
					add = sand_aspect_province_value
				}
				add_to_variable_list = {
					name = province_aspect_specialization_list
					target = flag:sand
				}
			}
			0 = {
				trigger = {
					NOT = {
						is_target_in_variable_list = {
							name = province_aspect_specialization_list
							target = flag:metal
						}
					} 
					metal_aspect_province_value > 0
				}
				modifier = {
					add = metal_aspect_province_value
				}
				add_to_variable_list = {
					name = province_aspect_specialization_list
					target = flag:metal
				}
			}
			0 = {
				trigger = {
					NOT = {
						is_target_in_variable_list = {
							name = province_aspect_specialization_list
							target = flag:time
						}
					} 
					time_aspect_province_value > 0
				}
				modifier = {
					add = time_aspect_province_value
				}
				add_to_variable_list = {
					name = province_aspect_specialization_list
					target = flag:time
				}
			}
			0 = {
				trigger = {
					NOT = {
						is_target_in_variable_list = {
							name = province_aspect_specialization_list
							target = flag:dawn
						}
					} 
					dawn_aspect_province_value > 0
				}
				modifier = {
					add = dawn_aspect_province_value
				}
				add_to_variable_list = {
					name = province_aspect_specialization_list
					target = flag:dawn
				}
			}
		}
	}
}
